plugin.name: Medina_Mapper_5
plugin.author: Zimbus
plugin.purpose: graphically map medina and normalize directions

muclient.triggers:
<trigger group="medina_sync" keep_evaluating="y" enabled="y" omit_from_output="y" match="^(?(?\w+) .*tells you: )(?.+)(?(?.[{])(?[>]{3})(?(?.*))(?\/zMMv(?\d[.]\d)\/)(?.)(?[>]{2})(?>))$" name="medina_receive_sync" regexp="y" sequence="100" script="on_trigger_medina_receive_sync" >
<trigger group="medina" keep_evaluating="y" lines_to_match="2" match="^Somewhere in an alleyway \[(?.*)\]\.(\n(?.* here.))?\Z" multi_line="y" name="medina_room_brief" regexp="y" sequence="100" script="on_trigger_medina_room_brief" send_to="12" >
<trigger group="medina" keep_evaluating="y" match="^You follow .* (?north|northeast|east|southeast|south|southwest|west|northwest)\.$" name="medina_you_follow" regexp="y" sequence="100" script="on_trigger_medina_you_follow" >
muclient.aliases:
<alias group="medina" name="medina_move_room" match="^(?n|ne|e|se|s|sw|w|nw|north|northeast|east|southeast|south|southwest|west|northwest|look|l)$" regexp="y" ignore_case="y" sequence="100" script="on_alias_medina_move_room" > <alias group="medina" name="medina_look_room" match="^l(ook)? (?n|ne|e|se|s|sw|w|nw|north|northeast|east|southeast|south|southwest|west|northwest)$" regexp="y" ignore_case="y" sequence="100" script="on_alias_medina_look_room" >
<alias enabled="y" group="medina_debug" name="medina_table" match="^med(ina)? ?t(able|bl)? ?(?[A-Ra-r])?$" regexp="y" ignore_case="y" sequence="100" script="on_alias_medina_table" > <alias enabled="y" group="medina_commands" name="medina_reset" match="^med(ina)? ?r(eset|s)? ?((?r)(oom)?)? ?(?[A-Ra-r])?$" regexp="y" ignore_case="y" sequence="100" script="on_alias_medina_reset" >
<alias enabled="y" group="medina_commands" name="medina_sync" match="^med(ina)? ?s(ync)?( (?\w+))?$" regexp="y" ignore_case="y" sequence="100" script="on_alias_medina_sync" >
